title: chEthulaara shringaaramu
sahitya:
cEtulAra shrngAramu jEsi cUtunu shrI rAma



anupallavi



sEtu bandhana surapati sara-sIruha bhavAdulu pogaDa nA



caraNam 1



merugu bangArandelu beTTi mETiyau sariga valvalu gaTTi sura

taru 

      sumamula siganinda jutti sundaramagu mOmuna muddubeTTi



caraNam 2



mOlanu kundanamu gejjalu gUrci mudduga nuduTanu tilakamu

dIrci 

      alakalapai rAvi rEkayu jArci andamaina ninnuramuna jErci



caraNam 3



 Ani mulyAla koNDE vEsi havusugA parimaLa gandhamu bUsi

      vAni suraticE visaraga vAsi vAsiyanuchu tyAgarAja nutayanni

rOsi
